metadata.title: CVE-2017-8395 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed inGNU Binutils 2.28, is vulnerable to an invalid write of size 8 because ofmissing a malloc() return-value check to see if memory had actually beenallocated in the _bfd_generic_get_section_contents function. Thisvulnerability causes programs that conduct an analysis of binary programsusing the libbfd library, such as objcopy, to crash.

criterions.comment: binutils package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
